revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== {{suffix|en|yield|less}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj|-}} # Not providing any [[yield]] or return. #* '''1983''', Martin S. Feldstein, ''Capital taxation'' (page 197) #*: In the sample case of riskless and '''yieldless''' money, and a multivariate normal distribution for the yields of all other assets, Tobin's famous separation theorem implies that a proportional tax decreases the demand for money and increases the demand for all risky assets. # {{lb|en|archaic}} [[unyielding]] #: ''And Death's grim hands grip hard below / At mortared seams of the '''yieldless''' stone''
